text:
Neil David Van Sickle (born July 8, 1915) is a retired American Air Force major general. He was the deputy inspector general at Headquarters, United States Air Force, Washington, D.C.
Van Sickle was born in Minot, North Dakota on July 8, 1915.
On January 15, 1965, he assumed command of the U.S. Air Force Recruiting Service, with headquarters at Randolph Air Force Base.
